criteria.inclusion_criteria: Aged 18-69 years, CHB,CHC,AFLD cirrhosis; ultrasonographic or CT evidences of cirrhosis and portal hypertension, mild ascitis,abnormal serum albumin<30g/L and/or bilirubin<170umol/L and/or prothrombin time>20s, hematoglobin>=7.0 g/L, platelet >=300000/mL, a Child-Turcotte-Pugh score or prior CTP score >=7 at screen.
criteria.exclusion_criteria: Severe hepatic encephalopathy or variceal bleeding; serum creatinine >=2 mg/dL, serum sodium<125 mEq/L; serum total bilirubin more than 3 mg/dL; presence of active untreated infectious disease; presence of hepatic, portal, or splenic vein thromboses on Doppler ultrasonography; presence of severe comorbid diseases (e.g., severe renal, respiratory, or cardiac disease), or presence of any type of malignancy; history of alcohol abuse, or use of hepatotoxic drugs within the last six months before enrolment; active substance abuse; pregnancy or lactation; can not sign the informed consent.
